plot: Porky Pig fights to get a room in the only vacant hotel in town. Unfortunately, he must share his room with Daffy Duck, who irritates Porky and makes the night uncomfortable for him.
title: Daffy Duck Slept Here
plot_es: Porky Pig fights to get a room in the only vacant hotel in town. Unfortunately, he must share his room with Daffy Duck, who irritates Porky and makes the night uncomfortable for him.
plot_en: Porky Pig fights to get a room in the only vacant hotel in town. Unfortunately, he must share his room with Daffy Duck, who irritates Porky and makes the night uncomfortable for him.

cast.role: Daffy Duck /              Porky Pig /              Hotel Clerks /              Manager /              Elevator Boy
cast.name: Mel Blanc
